name: tacky
content:
tacky adjective
(LOW QUALITY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal disapproving of cheap quality or in bad style: The shop sold tacky souvenirs and ornaments.

tacky adjective [-er/-est only]
(CHEAP)
infml disapproving cheap in quality or design: She reads those tacky romance novels.
